agency_customer_id.description: The unique ID for the customer within the agency's system.

loc_number.description: The location number for the agency.

name.description: The name of the insurance carrier.

naic_code.description: The NAIC code of the insurance carrier.

acord_form_number.description: The ACORD form number this schedule is attached to.

acord_form_title.description: The title of the ACORD form this schedule is attached to.

edition_date.description: The edition date of the form (e.g., YYYY/MM).

additional_remarks.description: The free-form text containing the additional remarks. This may include details about additional insureds, waivers of subrogation, or specific coverage information referenced by other forms.
